heading: HB02558
0: AN ACT CONSTITUTING THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT (COA), OFFICE OF THE OMBUDSMAN, AND COMMITTEE ON OVERSIGHT OF CONGRESS INTO A TRIPARTITE BODY TO BE KNOWN AS THE LEGISLATIVE AUDIT COUNCIL TO PERFORM IDENTIFIED TASKS ENABLING GOVERNMENT TO EFFECTIVELY RUN AFTER CORRUPT OFFICIALS AND PRIVATE INDIVIDUALS AND MAKE THEM TO ACCOUNT FOR EMBEZZLEMENT OF PUBLIC FUNDS
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2016-08-10
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02558
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CONSTITUTING THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT (COA), OFFICE OF THE OMBUDSMAN, AND COMMITTEE ON OVERSIGHT OF CONGRESS INTO A TRIPARTITE BODY TO BE KNOWN AS THE LEGISLATIVE AUDIT COUNCIL TO PERFORM IDENTIFIED TASKS ENABLING GOVERNMENT TO EFFECTIVELY RUN AFTER CORRUPT OFFICIALS AND PRIVATE INDIVIDUALS AND MAKE THEM TO ACCOUNT FOR EMBEZZLEMENT OF PUBLIC FUNDS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-08-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS ON 2016-08-10
